text: hey <@U7SL518D6> do you have a sense of what might be going on by chance? Support seems fairly confused by what's occurring, so I'm guessing it's some kind of rollout blip. I want to help point them to the right direction

Hey Jamie, so sorry you’re still dealing with this issue, if you send me your support ticket id, or the portal id for the account you placed the ticket in, I can see if I can provide any additional context to the support folks.
Thanks so much Jon. The ticket ID is: 8338981
It's affecting a couple different developer portals our team is using, so I can gather up those portal IDs if we have to fix each individually
It would be helpful to have at least some of those IDs. It sounds like it’s not just affecting you individually, other team members are facing the same issue?
<@U0284NAP353> can you add your developer portal?
My developer portal that cannot access it is: 19500575

I’ve added notes for the support person to help them resolve this quickly for you. The core issue is that the feature hasn’t rolled out to your accounts yet (it’s a beta feature). Requested for these accounts to be added. The support person will update you when the functionality is available to you.
Oh perfect. That's super helpful! We definitely love it and are relying on it already, so glad to know that
